Standardise a query object to match the fields of an endpoint

Source: R/query_standardize.R
standardise.Rd

Standardise a query object to match the fields of an endpoint

Usage

standardise(obj, qry)

Arguments

obj

A <class_care/caid/prov/open/hgov> object.

qry

A <class_query> object.

Value

A named list of query parameters that match the fields of the endpoint.

Examples

qry <- new_query(
   first_name = starts_with("Andr"),
   last_name  = contains("J"),
   state_cd   = any_of(c("CA", "GA", "NY")),
   city       = equals(c("Atlanta", "Los Angeles"), negate = TRUE),
   npi        = npi_ex$k,
   covered_recipient_npi = npi_ex$k,
   ccn        = "01256",
   rate       = between(0.45, 0.67),
   year       = 2014:2025)

standardise(endpoint("enroll_prov"), qry)
#> $params
#> $params$NPI
#>  [1] 1225701881 1174270805 1235702796 1962116806 1013647569 1306500665
#>  [7] 1982296737 1083295638 1841967825 1891390084 1275117269 1992338701
#> [13] 1891355863 1548743511 1023473279 1861857013 1689182859 1982059275
#> 
#> $params$STATE_CD
#> <any_of>
#>  @ operator: chr "IN"
#>  @ value   : chr [1:3] "CA" "GA" "NY"
#> 
#> $params$FIRST_NAME
#> <starts_with>
#>  @ operator: chr "STARTS_WITH"
#>  @ value   : chr "Andr"
#> 
#> $params$LAST_NAME
#> <contains>
#>  @ operator: chr "CONTAINS"
#>  @ value   : chr "J"
#> 
#> 
#> $query
#> $query$NPI
#>  [1] "filter[1][condition][path]=NPI"            
#>  [2] "filter[1][condition][operator]=="          
#>  [3] "filter[1][condition][value][1]=1225701881" 
#>  [4] "filter[1][condition][value][2]=1174270805" 
#>  [5] "filter[1][condition][value][3]=1235702796" 
#>  [6] "filter[1][condition][value][4]=1962116806" 
#>  [7] "filter[1][condition][value][5]=1013647569" 
#>  [8] "filter[1][condition][value][6]=1306500665" 
#>  [9] "filter[1][condition][value][7]=1982296737" 
#> [10] "filter[1][condition][value][8]=1083295638" 
#> [11] "filter[1][condition][value][9]=1841967825" 
#> [12] "filter[1][condition][value][10]=1891390084"
#> [13] "filter[1][condition][value][11]=1275117269"
#> [14] "filter[1][condition][value][12]=1992338701"
#> [15] "filter[1][condition][value][13]=1891355863"
#> [16] "filter[1][condition][value][14]=1548743511"
#> [17] "filter[1][condition][value][15]=1023473279"
#> [18] "filter[1][condition][value][16]=1861857013"
#> [19] "filter[1][condition][value][17]=1689182859"
#> [20] "filter[1][condition][value][18]=1982059275"
#> 
#> $query$STATE_CD
#> [1] "filter[2][condition][path]=STATE_CD" "filter[2][condition][operator]=IN"  
#> [3] "filter[2][condition][value][1]=CA"   "filter[2][condition][value][2]=GA"  
#> [5] "filter[2][condition][value][3]=NY"  
#> 
#> $query$FIRST_NAME
#> [1] "filter[3][condition][path]=FIRST_NAME"     
#> [2] "filter[3][condition][operator]=STARTS_WITH"
#> [3] "filter[3][condition][value]=Andr"          
#> 
#> $query$LAST_NAME
#> [1] "filter[4][condition][path]=LAST_NAME"   
#> [2] "filter[4][condition][operator]=CONTAINS"
#> [3] "filter[4][condition][value]=J"          
#> 
#> 
#> $identifier
#> [1] "https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/2457ea29-fc82-48b0-86ec-3b0755de7515/data-viewer?offset=0&size=1"
#> 

standardise(endpoint("dial_facility"), qry)
#> $params
#> $params$CCN
#> [1] "01256"
#> 
#> $params$city
#> <equals>
#>  @ operator: chr "<>"
#>  @ value   : chr [1:2] "Atlanta" "Los Angeles"
#> 
#> $params$NPI
#>  [1] 1225701881 1174270805 1235702796 1962116806 1013647569 1306500665
#>  [7] 1982296737 1083295638 1841967825 1891390084 1275117269 1992338701
#> [13] 1891355863 1548743511 1023473279 1861857013 1689182859 1982059275
#> 
#> $params$year
#>  [1] 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023 2024 2025
#> 
#> 
#> $query
#> $query$CCN
#> [1] "filter[1][condition][path]=CCN"    "filter[1][condition][operator]==" 
#> [3] "filter[1][condition][value]=01256"
#> 
#> $query$city
#> [1] "filter[2][condition][path]=city"           
#> [2] "filter[2][condition][operator]=<>"         
#> [3] "filter[2][condition][value][1]=Atlanta"    
#> [4] "filter[2][condition][value][2]=Los Angeles"
#> 
#> $query$NPI
#>  [1] "filter[3][condition][path]=NPI"            
#>  [2] "filter[3][condition][operator]=="          
#>  [3] "filter[3][condition][value][1]=1225701881" 
#>  [4] "filter[3][condition][value][2]=1174270805"

#>

#>  [1] "filter[4][condition][path]=year"     
#>  [2] "filter[4][condition][operator]=="    
#>  [3] "filter[4][condition][value][1]=2014" 
#>  [4] "filter[4][condition][value][2]=2015" 
#>  [5] "filter[4][condition][value][3]=2016"

#> $params$npi
#>  [1] 1225701881 1174270805 1235702796 1962116806 1013647569 1306500665

standardise(endpoint("pdc_clinician"), qry)
#> $params
#> $params$npi
#>  [1] 1225701881 1174270805 1235702796 1962116806 1013647569 1306500665
#>  [7] 1982296737 1083295638 1841967825 1891390084 1275117269 1992338701
#> [13] 1891355863 1548743511 1023473279 1861857013 1689182859 1982059275
#> 
#> 
#> $query
#> $query$npi
#>  [1] "conditions[0][property]=npi"         "conditions[0][operator]=="          
#>  [3] "conditions[0][value][1]=1225701881"  "conditions[0][value][2]=1174270805" 
#>  [5] "conditions[0][value][3]=1235702796"  "conditions[0][value][4]=1962116806" 
#>  [7] "conditions[0][value][5]=1013647569"  "conditions[0][value][6]=1306500665" 
#>  [9] "conditions[0][value][7]=1982296737"  "conditions[0][value][8]=1083295638" 
#> [11] "conditions[0][value][9]=1841967825"  "conditions[0][value][10]=1891390084"
#> [13] "conditions[0][value][11]=1275117269" "conditions[0][value][12]=1992338701"
#> [15] "conditions[0][value][13]=1891355863" "conditions[0][value][14]=1548743511"
#> [17] "conditions[0][value][15]=1023473279" "conditions[0][value][16]=1861857013"
#> [19] "conditions[0][value][17]=1689182859" "conditions[0][value][18]=1982059275"
#> 
#> 
#> $identifier
#> [1] "https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/api/1/datastore/query/mj5m-pzi6/0?count=true&results=true&offset=0&limit=1"
#>
